text:
Streak (YCS11) | Full-time | San Francisco | Onsite | Lots of roles

https://www.streak.com/careers

We bring context and workflow management directly to your inbox. Instead of getting an email about something that has changed in your ATS/Jira/CRM and then having to click through to take action, we put everything directly in your Gmail inbox and let you take action on it right there. People love us (https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/streak-crm-for-gma...), we're profitable, and growing.

== Engineers (https://www.streak.com/teams/engineering) ==

We have a very small team but take on large challenges. On the backend we are running the largest Cloud Spanner instance in the world (https://cloud.google.com/blog/products/databases/how-streak-...). On the front end we built the InboxSDK (https://www.inboxsdk.com/) to power our Gmail integration and powers other extensions that are used by millions of people everyday. No matter what you're interested in you will be challenged, learn, ship and make an impact.

== Sales (https://www.streak.com/teams/sales) ==

One of Streak's primary use cases is a CRM. As a sales person you have intimate understanding of our customer's needs because they're your own needs as well. We're also in the middle of building an incredible sales engine but it's still early and now is the best time to join.

== Operations (https://www.streak.com/teams/operations) ==

Join our small team to help grow the company and ensure everybody here is happy. We have a lot of work to do and you'll be working directly with a founder (me) and get a fantastic opportunity to grow and accelerate your career. We don't like picking just 5 key values because we think we can be great in many dimensions. It's hard for sure, but that's what makes it fun :)

If you have questions, comments, concerns or just want to riff you can reach out to me directly - omar@streak.com
